location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Charles William Burton, Bickaneer [B카k훮ner] to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Choy Hial, who had held offices for many years before resigning through ill health in June 1871 and who had most recently been a member of the Bickaneer [B카k훮ner] Council and was considered to be one of the few individuals giving good advice to the Maharaja.
